issue.title: Steam does not run when Block Outsider Intrusion into LAN filter is enabled

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard for Windows ### AdGuard version 7.21.1 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? the problem is with app, not a site ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? Steam app ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List ### Social Widgets AdGuard Social Media filter ### Annoyances AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter ### Security _No response_ ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific IndianList ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? Hide your search queries, Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. The Steam app does not run when `Block Outsider Intrusion into LAN` filter is enabled. 2. Many months ago, it used to cause a long delay to open Steam but back then this filter was not presented as an option in AdGuard for Windows's Add a filter page, so I didn't report back then 3. But now the filter is present in the list and enabling it causes the Steam app not able to run 4. Alternate is to either disable the filter or disable the Filter localhost option in Advanced Settings which would make this filter useless anyway 5. Either it should be fixed if possible, or the filter should be removed from AdGuard for Windows and other affected AdGuard apps. 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1:
### Privacy - [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
I think that should be enough for your Windows so that the rules no longer filters other processes that do not mimic the file name identical to the browser.

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard for Windows ### AdGuard version 7.21.1 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? the problem is with app, not a site ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? Steam app ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List ### Social Widgets AdGuard Social Media filter ### Annoyances AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter ### Security _No response_ ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific IndianList ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? Hide your search queries, Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. The Steam app does not run when `Block Outsider Intrusion into LAN` filter is enabled. 2. Many months ago, it used to cause a long delay to open Steam but back then this filter was not presented as an option in AdGuard for Windows's Add a filter page, so I didn't report back then 3. But now the filter is present in the list and enabling it causes the Steam app not able to run 4. Alternate is to either disable the filter or disable the Filter localhost option in Advanced Settings which would make this filter useless anyway 5. Either it should be fixed if possible, or the filter should be removed from AdGuard for Windows and other affected AdGuard apps. 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1:
### Privacy - [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
@krystian3w I see. This method doesn't seem optimal indeed.
But for personal usage, for example I only need Edge and Chrome, does simply adding `,app=chrome.exe|msedge.exe|` after every rule including whitelists is enough for it to work only on these two browsers?

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://vk.com/id655271228](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fvk.com%2Fid655271228) ### Comment > Здравствуйте Дорогие Разработчики приложения и Расширения Адгуард!!! Меня зовут Иван!!! я зайдя в ВК обнаружил рекламу (сверху где находится пункт управление аккаунтом, где нах-ся мини аватарка), выделив и пытаясь её заблокировать. я её заблокировал, но она не пропала, выделил снова. и выбрал пункт блокировать похожие!!! и тут произошло непонятно странное и пугающее, т.е: вместе с рекламой слетела и не устанавливается Аватарка с логотипом ПБК ЦСКА, зайдя в ВК через другой браузер, Яндекс явл-ся основным, там, в другом браузере, т.е Майкрософт Эдж, где расширение работает стабильно при работающем Расширении Адгуард, там аватарка отображается и проблем и сбоев нет, зашёл в смартфон, там тоже всё норм, всё отбражается!!! всё норм, а в Яндекс Браузере, при блокировке одной появившейся рекламы повторюсь, слета Аватарка!!! Выключил Расширение, аватарка появилась!!! но появилась и выскочила реклама под местом где нах-ся пункты: Профиль, Мессенджер и т.п (внизу), а как только включил расширение, реклама пропала. но вместо этого пропала аватарка и не устанавливается и не появляется до того момента, пока расширение не выключу!!! Прошу вас разобраться в чём причина сбоя!!! Заранее СПАСИБО за понимание!!! ### Screenshots

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [http://paramountplus.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fparamountplus.com)
### Comment
> No way to submit ticket without pictures and the issue only happens on roku, which I didn't take pictures of, but after much troubleshooting i've narrowed it down to this dns blocking content on the paramount plus app via roku. Plays content immediately when changing wifi to my phone hot spot or changing this dns on my router, but they have changed something on their side that this dns blocks and it is preventing content from loading. It's some kind of ad that plays before their content, even with paid subscriptions. Please look into this so I can keep using this dns. This issue is also all over reddit, but not necessarily with your DNS. I also tried numerous other dns options that block ads and none allowed this content to play. Thanks!
